subject: Basketball
All Star Games
lead_paragraph: Westbrook scored a record 27 points in the first half and finished with 41, just missing Wilt Chamberlain’s record of 42, set in the 1962 All-Star Game.
snippet: Westbrook scored a record 27 points in the first half and finished with 41, just missing Wilt Chamberlain’s record of 42, set in the 1962 All-Star Game.
